news.title: Trump's tariffs on cars, copper, drugs, aluminum could hit harder than other levies
news.summary: The sector-specific tariffs are putting pressure on businesses and foreign nations as they try to navigate Trump's constantly evolving trade agenda. The tariffs are aimed at industries such as aerospace, defense, energy and finance.

news.title: Hims & Hers to offer generic semaglutide in Canada as Novo Nordisk patent lapses
news.summary: Novo Nordisk will lose patent protection on its branded semaglutide drugs Ozempic and Wegovy in Canada after not paying maintenance fee in 2019.

news.title: Copper now costs way more in the U.S. than elsewhere. This could hit its economy hard
news.summary: The huge discrepancy in U.S. prices compared to those elsewhere is expected to have a major economic impact. The huge discrepancy is due to be caused by a huge increase in the cost of living in the United States.

news.title: BNY Mellon will have custody of Ripple's new stablecoin as institutional interest in crypto swells
news.summary: BNY Mellon will be the primary custodian for the Ripple's U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin reserves. The two companies jointly announced Wednesday.

news.title: Homebuyers finally responded, after mortgage rates hit lowest level in three months
news.summary: Mortgage demand took a big jump higher, as rates continue to fall to their lowest level in three months. Mortgage interest rates are now at their lowest levels in more than three years.

news.title: This big-name adviser says avoiding crypto is now a more speculative investment move than buying it
news.summary: Ric Edelman argues that the time to invest in cryptocurrencies is now, while 95% of the world is still asleep. Ric Edelman is the founder and CEO of digital asset management firm, Edelman Capital.

news.title: Home sellers have gotten tired of cutting prices. So they’re yanking their houses off the market.
news.summary: Home sellers in some of the nation’s worst housing markets are tired of cutting prices. So they’re pulling their listings.

news.title: I put my $500K inheritance into a joint account with my husband. Can I leave half of it to my son from a previous marriage?
news.summary: “If I predecease my husband, my will states that my son will receive half of this account,” she said.

news.title: ‘I do all the yard work, cooking and cleaning’: I live with my daughter and her lazy boyfriend. She wants me to buy her house. Do I say yes?
news.summary: “When I say anything, I am immediately wrong, unless my daughter wants something,” he says. “When he says anything, he is immediately wrong.”

news.title: This early-warning indicator is telling the stock market that a recession is more likely
news.summary: If you're like many U.S. consumers, you’re more worried now about money than ever before. If you're worried about money, you're more worried about your bank account than ever.
